Title: Crouching Carrot, Hidden Turnip
Description:
Uncle Chen's still got his eye on me, which means I won't be wandering off any time soon. I guess it's up to you to take these turnips... I mean, "carrots"... into the Twisted Warren and deliver them for me.

It should be pretty simple. Just toss the vegetables in front of virmen, then watch their reaction when they find out it's really a turnip!
ObjectivesText: Toss Orange-Colored Turnips in front of 12 Twitchheel Hoarders.
RewardText: Bah ha hah haaaa! I love messing with virmen.
